data.actual_result: Discord is extremely unresponsive, and has severe delay when trying to do anything except for scrolling
data.expected_result: Discord is responsive and allows you to switch servers and open profiles
data.short_description: Discord is extremely unresponsive on iPads with iOS 9
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord - Try to do anything that involves tapping, such as opening user profiles, switching servers, opening the channel/server list
